scripts.post-install-cmd: if test $(command -v composer); then composer_bin=composer; else composer_bin='php composer.phar'; fi; if test ! -e Plugin/SynchroDossier/webroot/bootstrap; then ln -s $(pwd)/$($composer_bin config vendor-dir)/twbs/bootstrap Plugin/SynchroDossier/webroot/bootstrap; fi
scripts.post-update-cmd: if test $(command -v composer); then composer_bin=composer; else composer_bin='php composer.phar'; fi; if test ! -e Plugin/SynchroDossier/webroot/bootstrap; then ln -s $(pwd)/$($composer_bin config vendor-dir)/twbs/bootstrap Plugin/SynchroDossier/webroot/bootstrap; fi
